/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings painted in vibrant shades of red and white, their balconies adding architectural interest. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the colorful buildings. In the background, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape.
